effect_entries.effect: Teaches Giga Drain to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Telekinesis to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Giga Drain Gen I: Seismic Toss)

flavor_text_entries.text:
地面に　降りて　体を　やすめる。
最大ＨＰの　半分の
ＨＰを　回復する。

The user lands and rests its body.
It restores the user’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.

Chi la usa sta fermo e riposa, recuperando
metà dei propri PS massimi.

Descarga de lodo tóxico que puede llegar a
envenenar al objetivo.

Anwender landet und ruht sich aus. KP des
Anwenders werden um 50 % der maximalen KP
aufgefüllt.

Le lanceur atterrit et se repose.
Restaure jusqu’à la moitié de ses PV max.

땅에 내려와 몸을 쉬게 한다.
최대 HP의 절반만큼
HP를 회복한다.

じめんに　おりて　からだを　やすめる。
さいだい　ＨＰの　はんぶんの
ＨＰを　かいふく　する。

The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is easier
to hit for three turns.

The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is easier
to hit for three turns.

Un pouvoir qui fait flotter l’ennemi
dans les airs. Pendant 3 tours, il
devient plus facile à atteindre.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s
HP is restored by half the damage
taken by the target.

A harsh attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

Recovers half the
HP of the damage 
this move inflicts.

HP of the damage
